duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the support of the client's Ping BAU environment.
Perform the requirements, development, testing and implementation activities related to scalable enterprise directory and associated identity services.
Work with stakeholders to define and document business requirements and technical documentation to integrate applications into directory and identity services.

Work across IAM teams to ensure architecture coherence and alignment across user administration and governance, privileged access management, web access management services, logging and SIEM services.
Ensure that directory architecture, designs, plans, controls, processes are aligned with strategy and standards and be able to communicate and defend architecture positions.
